text.section:
This section applies to an allowance of:
a retiree, former member, or surviving spouse of a member of the Employees' Retirement System or the Teachers' Retirement System who is subject to Selection C (Combination formula); or
a beneficiary of the retiree or former member described in item (1) of this subsection.

This section does not apply to:
benefits paid in a single payment; or
the return of accumulated contributions.
